trans-unit.source: Specifies the system to use when evaluating coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Especifica a utilizar ao avaliar as coordenadas do sistema.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that coordinates are in the device coordinate context.
trans-unit.target: Especifica que as coordenadas são no contexto de coordenada de dispositivo.

trans-unit.source: On a computer screen the device coordinates are usually measured in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Um dispositivo de ecrã do computador coordenadas são, normalmente, medidas em pixéis.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that coordinates are in the page coordinate context.
trans-unit.target: Especifica que as coordenadas são no contexto de coordenada de página.

trans-unit.source: Their units are defined by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit*> property, and must be one of the elements of the <xref href="System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: As unidades são definidas pelo <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit*>propriedade, e tem de ser um dos elementos do <xref href="System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit"> </xref> enumeração.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit*>

trans-unit.source: Specifies that coordinates are in the world coordinate context.
trans-unit.target: Especifica que as coordenadas são no contexto coordenada mundo.

trans-unit.source: World coordinates are used in a nonphysical environment, such as a modeling environment.
trans-unit.target: As coordenadas do mundo são utilizadas num ambiente nonphysical, como num ambiente de modelação.
